title: Dont Throw It Away
description: This project is a website designed to educate users about e-waste, including proper disposal methods and how e-waste can be transformed into valuable resources.

title: Radiant Scorer
description: This project is a website designed for interactive learning through games, featuring a quiz and reward system to help users learn and understand new concepts in fun and engaging way.

title: Rcare
description: This project is a mobile application designed for mental healthcare. It allows users to track their mood by keeping a journal, recording daily mood levels, and accessing personalized content to enhance mental well-being.
